page.title: 08Children's Games-Rufforth
page.content: Some children like games very much because they are fun{.There are indoor {games and outdoor games.}Some games involve physical action.Some games are played sitting down.Some outdoor games are{Billy One Two Three, a version of {Hide and Seek; Pass Word Chase, a {version of Chase.}We did a survey {of {10 3rd and 4th years and 10 Infants.} The most common Junior board games in order are Monopoly, Ludo and Cluedo. The most common Infant board games in order are Ludo and Monopoly.The most popular Infant outdoor game was{Hide {and Seek.}Games Juniors play are playing with a{ball}or{riding bikes. Some children go to organized games like{Tennis,Football}and{Cricket.Games played in school are{Rounders,Cricket {Football}and{Netball.}Sometimes the school arranges{matches}against other schools.
